item.title: By: chakira
item.dc:creator: chakira
item.description: What about Jews (like me) who sympathize with the Adorno and even Heideggarian accounts of the Holocaust as symptomatic of modernity? Am I just out of sync? I feel like there is definitely a Jewish subcurrent of a more universalizable Holocaust.
